item.description:
Join us for a Republican Meetup at The Point!

The Boston Republican Party Meetup Group and Boston Young Republicans Meetup Group meet the 3rd Tuesday of every month at Hennessy's, but on 03/03/09 we're trying something different!

It's a casual gathering; come for dinner, drinks, or just the conversation and company. Possibility of free appetizers if our crowd is large enough.

The Point validates parking at the Parcel 7 garage just across Hanover St: $3 for 3 hours!

All are welcome! Invite your friends!

Check out the Facebook page here: http://www.facebook.c...
item.name: Republican Meetup at The Point
